videos.title: 🔍 Go Slice Memory Secrets: Understand len() vs cap() in 60 Seconds!
videos.description:
📌 In this short and sharp Go tutorial, learn the key differences between `len()` and `cap()` in slices:

💡 What you’ll learn:
- ✅ What `len()` really measures
- ✅ What `cap()` means for memory allocation
- 🔄 How appending changes slice capacity
- ⚡ Visual examples with step-by-step explanations

💼 Perfect for:
- Beginners mastering Go slices
- Devs preparing for Go interviews
- Performance-focused coding

#golang #goprogramming #slices #shorts #coding #devtips

videos.title: 📈 How Go Slices Grow: Watch cap() Evolve in Real Time! 💥

💼 Useful for:

#golang #goprogramming #slice #len #cap #interviewquestions #techshorts

videos.title: 🔀 Hidden Trap: Slice vs Array in Go (len vs cap Explained!)
videos.description:
🧠 Confused between arrays and slices in Go?
This short video clears it up with a real example of len() and cap():

🎯 Key Highlights:
- Arrays vs Slices: Memory structure
- Slicing impact on cap()
- Real Go interview insights

💼 For:
- Go beginners
- Developers facing slice confusion
- Interview prep made visual

#golang #arrays #slices #gointerview #codingtips #golangshorts
